Token.Abstract: A simple interface for interacting with the Twitter REST API, automating sign-in and OAuth signing of requests against the API.
Displays an auth dialog and populates the authToken, authTokenSecret, userId, and screenName properties if the Twitter user grants permission to the application.

Parameter.Name: failure
Parameter.Abstract: Invoked upon an error occurring in the authorization process.

Parameter.Name: cancel
Parameter.Abstract: Invoked when the user cancels authorization.

Token.Abstract: Adds a 3-legged OAuth signature to an NSMutableURLRequest based upon the properties set for the Twitter object. Use this function to sign requests being made to the Twitter API.
